reviews.title: Nexus 7 works great
reviews.comment: Downloaded this as I have a great respect for the quality of DK books. This app is close, but not up to their usual standard. The magnetic board works fine, just need to tap the letter first to have it appear, then you can drag it around. I am really hoping someone comes up with some useful educational apps for children soon. The ones I have seen so far are pretty poor. This one could be so much better also. Wish I could program better as I have loads of ideas for educational apps.
reviews.author: A Google User
